KCNA delegation leaves for China 
    Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Central News Agency led by deputy director general Ri Hae Ryong left here today to visit China.
 The delegation was seen off at Pyongyang Railway Station by Han Song Bok, deputy director general of the KCNA, and Li Bin, charge d'affaires ad interim of the Chinese embassy here.
